thread.title: BRIEF-Sharp Corp's Group Operating Profit For Nine Months Ended December Looks To Have Reached Around 70 Bln Yen - Nikkei ‍​

title: BRIEF-Sharp Corp's Group Operating Profit For Nine Months Ended December Looks To Have Reached Around 70 Bln Yen - Nikkei ‍​

organizations.name: brief-sharp corp's group operating profit for nine months

text:
Jan 26 (Reuters) - Nikkei:
* SHARP CORP‘S GROUP OPERATING PROFIT FOR NINE MONTHS ENDED DECEMBER LOOKS TO HAVE SOARED 270 PERCENT ON THE YEAR TO AROUND 70 BILLION YEN - NIKKEI ‍​
* SHARP CORP'S SALES FOR THE THREE QUARTERS PROBABLY ROSE ABOUT 20 PERCENT TO ROUGHLY 1.8 TLN YEN - NIKKEI Source text : [ s.nikkei.com/2BwACZl ] Further company coverage:
